segmentosSRT.text:
But not my money.
They sound like a pack of mules.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: It's not good for the baby.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: If nothing else, can't you think of the baby?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: All right, do it yourself. But please don't cry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: No, have him wait. I'll be right there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: This is the last time, okay? I promise.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: You can't just win and walk away.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: I'd like to borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: I want to live. There's nothing like family.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Chunsheng and I are lucky
to meet someone as nice as you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Dying like this,
their families won't even know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: we've got to make it back alive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- On one of the wounded.
- It's a killing field.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Mother died without knowing where I was.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: we sang for the Liberation Army.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Suppose I was singing for her, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: She was fine when I left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: This is our town leader, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: I just dragged a cannon and sang opera.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
He joined the army as a driver.
He went south with them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Surely not. We lost that status to Long'er.
So, what are we?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Sounds okay to me.
And I took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- What are you looking for?
- That certificate.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: It's good to be poor. Nothing like it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: they captured two mountains a day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: This hasn't anything to do with us adults.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Said he was a saboteur. I had to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Can't you see I'm doing this for our family?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: If you indulge him, we'll all go to ruin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: How do you like my singing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Pack a lunchbox. I'll wake him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Smelting steel is a duty.
We can't be politically backward.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu praised us in front of everyone.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: You have to go smelt steel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: our lives will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
And there'll be dumplings and meat
every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: It was you who killed my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son, Chunsheng!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- You're eating?
- Come on in, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't let me interrupt.
- We're finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Put these old things to new use.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Jiazhen's health is poor.
If we're together, I can look after her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: His leg's not so bad, and he seems nice.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: If it doesn't work out, we'll keep looking.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu said he was a Red Guard.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't rush off!
- I'll make you something to eat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: At least it's loud enough for her to hear.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Sit with us for a bit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng came to wish Fengxia well.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: You can't go on avoiding him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Can't we put this behind us?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: And will be better for your child.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Let's say we accept this money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Keep it for us. There's plenty of time.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi sent word from the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: She's in labor. We're on our way there.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Niu, don't let it get to you. Take care!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
- Sorry for the trouble.
- It's our job.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Even if he only stands by, we would relax.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text:
Erxi's is a work-related injury.
It's not hereditary.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and I'll make some noodles.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: I'll find a home for them when we get back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: If I hadn't given Dr. Wang those buns...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: He could have saved our Fengxia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: We shouldn't have given him water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: People say, once you drink water...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: one bun in the stomach turns to seven.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi, is it true that Dr. Wang...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: the chickens will turn into geese...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: and the geese will turn into sheep...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: and the sheep will turn into oxen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun won't ride on an ox...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18

segmentosSRT.text: and life will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_18
